fields.name: Featured Job Listing - 7 Days
fields.description: Boost your job posting visibility for 7 days. Your listing will appear at the top of search results and get highlighted with a premium badge, attracting 3x more qualified candidates.

fields.name: Featured Job Listing - 30 Days
fields.description: Premium visibility for a full month. Your job posting stays at the top with enhanced features including priority placement, featured badge, and extended reach to passive job seekers.

fields.name: Advanced Recruitment Tools Suite
fields.description: Unlock powerful recruitment features including AI-powered candidate matching, advanced filtering by skills and experience, bulk candidate messaging, resume parsing, and detailed candidate analytics dashboard.

fields.name: Bulk Job Posting Package
fields.description: Post up to 50 jobs simultaneously with CSV upload capability. Includes job templates, auto-posting across multiple platforms, and centralized application management. Perfect for recruitment agencies and growing companies.

fields.name: Advanced Analytics & Insights
fields.description: Comprehensive hiring analytics with real-time dashboards showing application trends, candidate source tracking, time-to-hire metrics, conversion rates, and competitive salary insights. Export custom reports in PDF and Excel formats.
